results.title: Metformin enhances anti-cancer effects of cisplatin in meningioma through AMPK-mTOR signaling pathways
results.text_hl: ...To evaluate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could enhance the @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@-induced anti-proliferative effect in @<m>DISEASE_Meningioma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008579 @@@meningioma@@@ cells in vitro, we first evaluated @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s anti-@<m>DISEASE_Meningioma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008579 @@@meningioma@@@ effect alone.

citations.NLM: Guo L, Cui J, Wang H, Medina R, Zhang S, Zhang X, Zhuang Z, Lin Y. Metformin enhances anti-cancer effects of cisplatin in meningioma through AMPK-mTOR signaling pathways Mol Ther Oncolytics. 2021 Mar 26;20():119-131. PMID: 33575476

results.title: Metformin Is Associated with a Lower Incidence of Benign Brain Tumors: A Retrospective Cohort Study in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: While comparing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ ever users to never users, a significantly (50%) lower risk was observed for both BBT and @<m>DISEASE_Meningioma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008579 @@@cerebral meningioma@@@.

citations.NLM: Tseng CH. Metformin Is Associated with a Lower Incidence of Benign Brain Tumors: A Retrospective Cohort Study in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Biomolecules. 2021 Sep 25;11(10):. PMID: 34680039

results.title: Diabetes, use of metformin, and the risk of meningioma
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@, use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Meningioma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008579 @@@meningioma@@@
